Test Name: C-Reactive Protein (CRP), Immunoglobulin E (IgE), and Serum analysis
Specimen Type: Serum or plasma (CRP); Serum (IgE and general serum tests)
Purpose: To generate reliable and accurate CRP, IgE, and serum chemistry results while maintaining compliance with regulatory standards.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) for serum specimens; heparinized plasma tube for plasma specimens
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer with CRP and IgE test kits, and a general chemistry analyzer
